name: Tattie Season
description:
Tattie Season

Dig into this season focused platformer style game created by six folks for #LD52, a game jam spanning the 06th-09th of January 2023. The theme for the jam announced on the kick-off was Harvest!

Spuddie is a potato, a potato that survivied the last harvest, on the run from the farmer that kidnapped their friends and family last tattie season. You'll need to stay hydrated on your journey, prey the farmer doesn't dig you up this winter, good luck!

Controls

WASD to move around

SPACE to jump

Credits

Marton - Programming

Agent_Pete- Sound Design, Audio, Programming

Alex - Programming

Melody - Art & Animation

Ren - Art

Rosia - Art

This game was made for LudumDare 52 with the theme 'harvest', check out the submission page here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/tattie-season
